info.name: Bresenham's Line Algorithm
info.description:
Bresenham Line Algorithm Demo
- Controls (For Desktop/Laptop only):

- Modify pixel resolution by updating "pxRes" variable in the code.

info.name: Cornell Box Path Tracing
info.description:
Path Tracing in the Cornell Box.

Features: 
• Metallic and non-metallic surfaces
• Levels of roughness
• Light sources and emission power
• Caustics
• Transparency
• Transmittance
• Reflections
• Refraction
• Dispersion
• FXAA
• MSAA

info.name: Fork Pixel Sort vinnieyoun 812
info.description:
This is a variation of the Pixel Sorting shader by @cornusammonis here https://www.shadertoy.com/view/XdcGWf

It works on video by blending the sorted image to the incoming video by  a factor of 100 to 1.

Also uses real luminance equation.

info.name: predator-prey with diffusion
info.description:
Click palette in corner to select population to inject into the domain, and click in domain to inject selected population at the location. May exhibit numerical instability.

Red = predator
Green = prey

Tip: rewind and pause to set up initial conditions.

info.name: Fork Fibonacci  LollypopG 499
info.description: Each circle has 2 children which are .618 the size of the parent.  We start getting some mergers by the 4th generation, so if you count the number of circles in each row you'll get fibonacci numbers minus 1.
